pageContext.claim: “The Radical Left, Do Nothing Democrats keep chanting “fairness”, when they put on the most unfair Witch Hunt in the history of the U.S. Congress. They had 17 Witnesses, we were allowed ZERO, and no lawyers. They didn't do their job, had no case. The Dems are scamming America!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump's tweet suggests Republicans could not have any witnesses in the impeachment inquiry, but some witnesses offered by the GOP did testify. Trump blocked many witnesses from testifying.
